title: WinUtilities_9.51.Pro Final + Serial-TrT
description:
WinUtilities version 9.51 PRO [Latest version]
Full Pro version with Serial
See below for install notes.


WinUtilities is an award winning collection of tools to optimize and speedup 
your system performance. This suite contains utilities to clean registry, 
temporary files on your disks, erase your application and internet browser history, 
cache and cookies. you can control startup programs that load automatically with windows, 
find duplicate files, fix broken shortcuts and uninstall unneeded software. 
other features include secure file deletion, recycle bin shredding, 
cleaning tasks scheduling and undelete deleted files. WinUtilities is a system tweaking 
suite that includes more than 20 tools to improve and tweak your PC's performance. 
It offers an attractive and easy to use interface that organizes all tasks into categories 
and provides graphical statistics whenever possible. The tools include Junk File Cleaner, 
Registry Cleaner, Memory Optimizer, System Information, Registry Backup, File Encryption, 
Safe Uninstaller, Duplicate File Finder, File Shredder and much more. 
WinUtilities also includes an Internet Tracks Eraser with Cookie Manager 
and Secure Deletion. Overall, a great bundle that offers a wide range of system tools 
with extra benefits which are not easy to find.

KEY BENEFITS: 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Disk Defrag - Defragment your disks and improve computer performance and stability 
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ File Undelete - Recovers deleted files on NTFS and FAT volumes.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Disk Cleaner- Cleans disks from information that clogs your system and reduces the performance of your computer.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Registry Cleaner - Scans the Windows registry and finds incorrect or obsolete information in the Windows Registry.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Startup Cleaner - Helps you to easily manage program execution at windows startup.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ History Cleaner - Erases all traces of activity on your computer, save spaces and protect your privacy.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ File Splitter - Splits any type of file into smaller pieces and rejoin them to the original file.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ File Shredder - Erases files and make sure that no data thief can get his hands on your sensitive data.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ File Lock & EXE Protector - Protects any Windows executable file with a secure password.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Memory Optimizer - Optimizes the Memory Management of Windows. No special configuration is needed, Memory Optimizer will auto configure itself.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Duplicate Files Finder - Helps you to free disk space by finding and removing duplicate files from your system.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Shortcuts Fixer - Provides you with an easy way to address the invalid shortcuts and reports back to you so that you can remove it from your system.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Process Manager - Allows you to check your system's performance and manage the running processes.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Uninstall Manager - Manages the programs installed on your system and uninstall unneeded software.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ System Information - Shows you the detailed information for your computer hardware and software.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Registry Backup&Restore - Back up and restore the Windows Registry.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Registry Search - Searchs the Windows Registry by a specific wildcard. then you can delete or export them.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ BHO Remover - Manages the BHOs that are currently installed.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Auto Shutdown - Schedules your computer for log off, stand by, hibernate, or shutdown at a specific time.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Windows Tools - Provides you an easy way to launch the utilities build in Windows.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ System Control - Organizes and manage your Windows Settings
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Task Scheduler - Configures the cleaning tasks that take place automatically.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Improved File Shredder module
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Fixed a bug in Registry Cleaner that may cause Windows Live Contacts disappear
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Registry Cleaner module upgraded to v6.0
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Supports to change registration key in registered version
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Improved Shortcuts Fixer module

WinUtilities is compatible with Windows 2000, Windows XP 32 bit, Windows XP 64 bit, 
Windows Vista 32 bit, Windows Vista 64 bit, Windows 7 32 bit, Windows 7 64 bit.

(2) Register with one of the Serials (see serial.txt inside the zip file)
(3) Done, 

Enjoy, TrT
